InstallTask.uiDescription: Offline Mode with Interactive Inner Sphere
Base difficulty goes up the more money your mechs are worth. 16,500,000 cbills per half-skull. It counts the most expensive mechs you can drop all at once.
InstallTask.uiName: Difficulty by Company Strength - Challenge scales with the cost of your mechs

InstallTask.uiDescription: Every Planet has their own Difficulty Rating Some systems are difficult, some are easy.
InstallTask.uiName: Difficulty by Planet Rating - Planets never change their Skulls.

InstallTask.uiDescription: Randomizes Spawns.
Disabled Random Spawns.
Receive Allied Support on Tougher Contracts.

InstallTask.promptText: Warning! Enemies will vastly outnumber you?;;Yes, Hurt me!;;No Way
InstallTask.uiDescription: DO NOT! Receive Allied Support on Tougher Contracts.
Standard Map Size.
33% Increased Map Size.
66% Increased Map Size.
100% Increased Map Size.
Damage and status effects as floaties around the mech, no Combat Log
Converts all Floaties to persistent Combat Log in the upper right corner
Start the Game with pre-defined Pilots. They have painted pictures and unused EXP
Start the Game with randomly generated, editable, Pilots. Ones like you commonly find in the hiring hall.
Content based on and requiring the Flashpoint DLC
